product_name: Helly Hansen Cool T-Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's performance-packed Helly Hansen Cool T-Shirt for athletes features sweat-wicking, quick-drying fabric that won't bog you down during high-intensity pursuits. Polyester/polypropylene jersey with Lifa(R) Stay Dry technology pulls excess heat and sweat away from your skin and dries fast to keep you comfortable. Fabric also encourages air circulation to keep you cool and offers UPF 30 sun protection. Flatlock seams lie flat and won't irritate skin. Helly Hansen Cool T-Shirt for men features a regular fit. Closeout.
short_description: The men's performance-packed Helly Hansen Cool T-Shirt for athletes features sweat-wicking, quick-drying fabric that won't bog you down during high-intensity pursuits.
